Name: Amend article 7A of the New York State real property actions and proceedings law to facilitate the remediation of severe housing quality issues. (S.5622A)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.5622A, which would amend article 7A of the New York State real property actions and proceedings law to facilitate the remediation of severe housing quality issues

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
